analysis.description:
MultiSend.Send (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#102-130) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-pecul.transfer(toAddress,amountTo_Send) (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#129-130)

Peculium.UpgradeTokens (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#333-350) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-peculOld.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amountChanged) (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#339-345)

MultiSend.Send has external calls inside a loop:
	- pecul.transfer(toAddress,amountTo_Send) (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#129-130)

Reentrancy in Peculium.UpgradeTokens (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#333-350):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(peculOld.totalSupply() > 0) (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#337)
	- amountChanged = peculOld.allowance(msg.sender,address(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#337-339)
	- peculOld.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amountChanged) (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#339-345)
	- peculOld.burn(amountChanged) (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#345)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#345-346)
	- balances (/unique_contracts/0x5487939f38ad535223a6f5441edd43fac291da31.sol#346-347)
